subject: Invoice submission – Jan freight services (INV 104992)
body:
Hello,

Please find attached our invoice for January freight services.

Invoice #: 104992
Amount: USD 7,842.17
PO: PO-77123
Service period: Jan 1–31

Let me know if anything else is needed.

Regards,
Jules Kramer
Stonefield Logistics
+1 (312) 555-0194

subject: RE: Payment status? INV 88713 / overdue
body:
Hi Finance Team,

Following up — can you confirm when payment will be released for INV 88713? Terms NET30 and it is now overdue.

Invoice: 88713
Amount: USD 18,300.00
PO: PO-66210
Vendor: NorthPeak Chemicals

If there’s a hold, please advise reason + what you need.

Thanks,
Sana

-----Original Message-----
From: Sana Iqbal <ar@northpeak-chem.com>
Sent: Thu, Jan 29, 2026 4:02 PM
Subject: Payment status? INV 88713

subject: URGENT: Bank change request – Apex Industrial (effective immediately)
body:
Hello,

We have changed banks and need all future payments updated effective immediately.

Vendor: Apex Industrial Supplies
Vendor ID (if you have it): 00018422
New bank: BMO
Transit: 00123
Institution: 0001
Account: 9876543

Please confirm once updated.

Regards,
Meghan Rhodes
AP Coordinator
Apex Industrial Supplies

NOTE: Please do NOT send payments to the old account.

subject: FW: Invoice rejected – price mismatch PO-55219 (INV 55501)
body:
Finance,

Forwarding — invoice failed 3-way match.

PO-55219
Invoice 55501
Line 2 price on invoice is $125/unit but PO shows $118.
GR posted yesterday for full qty.

Can you advise whether we need a PO change or AP can proceed with approved variance?

—Kunal

-----Forwarded message-----
From: billing@everoakpackaging.com
Sent: Tue, Feb 2, 2026 10:41 AM
Subject: Invoice rejected – please help

Hi,
We received notice invoice 55501 cannot be processed. Please advise.
EverOak Packaging

subject: Expense report returned — missing receipt? ER-019332
body:
Hi team,

My expense report ER-019332 got returned but I’m not sure what’s missing.

Employee: Lena Park (EID 44817)
Report: ER-019332
Total: CAD 312.44
Submitted: Jan 29

Can you tell me exactly what I need to fix?

Thanks,
Lena

subject: Customer invoice needed – BlueNova Retail (PO 900771) – need today
body:
Hi AR,

Can you generate an invoice for customer BlueNova Retail for the Feb 3 shipment?

Customer: BlueNova Retail
Customer ID: C-100882
PO: 900771
Amount: USD 42,500.00
Bill-to: BlueNova Retail Inc.
Ship-to: BlueNova DC - Reno
Need by: today EOD

Thanks,
Marcos

subject: Payment applied wrong customer – need cash reapplication
body:
Hi Cash App team,

We received $9,880.00 from “Summit Fiber LLC” but it was applied to the wrong account (Summit Fabrics).

Payment date: Feb 4
Amount: USD 9,880.00
Bank ref: 24021988
Correct customer: Summit Fiber LLC (C-20911)
Incorrect customer: Summit Fabrics (C-12003)

Can you move the cash and confirm once corrected?

Thanks,
Jenna

subject: Credit memo request – damaged items on INV 33018
body:
Hello,

Requesting a credit memo for damaged items received on Invoice 33018.

Invoice: 33018
PO: 900771
Damage claim: 12 units SKU XZ-440 (crushed packaging)
Requested credit: USD 1,200.00

We can share photos if required.

Regards,
Angela Price
AP – BlueNova Retail

subject: Journal entry request – reclass freight accrual (Jan close)
body:
Hi GL,

Need a JE to reclass a portion of Jan freight accrual from 6100 to 6125.

Entity: US01
Amount: USD 27,400
Dr: 6125 Freight – Outbound
Cr: 6100 Freight – Accrual
Effective date: 2026-01-31
Reason: booked to wrong account during close.

Can you post ASAP and reply with JE number.

Thanks,
Ravi

subject: Close support: AP accrual variance explanation needed (US01)
body:
Morning,

We need an explanation for the AP accrual variance on US01 for Jan close.

Account: 210200 AP Accrual
Variance vs forecast: +USD 84,600
Observed drivers: freight + packaging

Can someone provide a summary + whether this reverses in Feb?

Thanks,
Nadia

subject: Invoice follow-up: did you receive INV 104992? (Stonefield)
body:
Hi,

Following up — did you receive INV 104992 we sent last week? Want to ensure it’s in process.

Thanks,
Jules
Stonefield Logistics

subject: AP Payments: remittance advice needed for last payment (NorthPeak)
body:
Hi,

Thanks for the update earlier. Can you send remittance advice for the last payment made to NorthPeak Chemicals? Our team needs it to close open items.

Vendor: NorthPeak Chemicals
Invoice(s): 88713

Appreciate it,
Sana
